taxYearClaimedFor.description: The tax year to which the claim applies. The start year and end year must not span two tax years. The minimum tax year is 2019-20. No gaps are allowed, for example, 2022-24 is not valid.

typeOfLoss.description: The type of business the loss applies to.

typeOfClaim.description: The type of claim to be applied. Permitted values for "self-employment": carry-forward, carry-sideways. Permitted values for "uk-property-non-fhl" and "foreign-property": carry-sideways, carry-sideways-fhl, carry-forward-to-carry-sideways.

businessId.description: An identifier for the business, unique to the customer.
